short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Google search experience with summaries from reddit and other websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of adding "site:reddit.com" to all your searches?

This extension searches reddit and other custom websites you specify on top of your Google searches and displays results and their summaries in a sidebar.
